segments.text: Shouldn't you already be in bed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't sleep . I'm really not all that tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to get some rest , as you have to get up early in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's impossible for me to get to sleep right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just close your eyes , and try not to think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That really does not work for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter , you need to get some sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about I tire myself out , and then fall asleep when I'm tired ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you're not going to go to sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , I'll make sure and get to sleep in a little while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want you in bed , right now , so sweet dreams .
segments.speaker: S1
